abstract.p: Corrigendum to article ‘Influenza immunisation status among nursing students’ by Linda S. Koharchik, Khlood Salman, Elaine Hardy and Kathy Mayle-Towns. Journal of Infection Prevention 13: 84–87.

body.p: The authors acknowledge an erroneous statement in their manuscript. We stated, “The Society of Healthcare Epidemiology (SHEA) maintains that healthcare personnel have professional and ethical responsibility to comply with yearly influenza immunisation to protect their patients (Talbot et al., 2010); however, to date SHEA has not addressed the responsibility of student nurses and the influenza immunisation.” SHEA does in fact state that influenza immunization should be mandated for all students who practice in healthcare facilities (Revised SHEA paper: influenza vaccination of healthcare personnel, Infection Control and Hospital Epidemiology 31(10): 987–95).
